name: Attack Them
description:
Attack Them is a 2D shooter game wherein multiple enemies get spawned at different positions and they come to attack you. You might get different weapons or health pick-ups when you kill the enemies. 

The objective of this game is to kill all the enemies before they kill you.  Easy, right? We'll see!

Credits: 

Sprites- Tasty Characters - Sea Pack (Unity Asset Store)

Sound Effects- freesound.org
